response.original_title: After her long slumber, Brothers regret
response.overview: "After Her Long Slumber, Brothers Regret" is a short drama about a woman who volunteers for a 30-year sleep experiment, disappearing from her family. Upon awakening, she returns to find her biological family indifferent, preferring an adopted daughter, leading her to reunite with her loving adoptive family. The film explores themes of family, identity, and belonging.
response.title: After her long slumber, Brothers regret
